3: Tch... of course it's you.
(Removes her weapon from the guard) Huh? Oh! You're both here!
Do you have to make such a fuss?
Well, Nanami can't just let Roland get away...
Roland?! Where is he?
I don't know! Nanami's looking for him as well!
Isn't it Kamui's mission to hunt the Ascendant...?
I lost him.
Can't believe how messy this whole situation is.
Then, should we... go after the Ascendant? Or continue our mission?
(Announce his thoughts loudly) I've seen with my own eyes how the antigen affected Roland and the Punishing Virus...
Nanami said Roland's still inside the Golden Vortex... Think about it. He's barely hanging on, but he's still staying here. If you ask me, I bet he's here for one reason—to destroy the antigen.
That makes sense. The Ascendants wouldn't allow the antigen to threaten them.
The antigen is still a rogue element right now—no one has weaponized it yet. If I were Roland, I'd be mad anxious.
Before its weaponization, the Ascendants will do whatever it takes to destroy the antigen.
Although it isn't stable, it's still going to help Earth out in a huge way.
You're right. We can't let Roland destroy it.
Nanami, I need some leads on Roland. Anything. Don't skip any detail...
...Nanami isn't sure, either. But the guards can help!
Nanami holds up a circular component in gold taken from a guard.
What are you trying to do? Enough with the theatrics!
This golden circle can control the guards...
Nanami is going to hack it and finds out which guards have been taken down by Roland! Then we just have to follow the bodies!
That's brilliant, Nanami!
As long as Roland's in the Golden Vortex, the guards here are going to find him before we do! They're going to leave a lot of bodies behind when they fight—finding the bodies means finding Roland!
That's right! Hehe!
(Mumbles) Who would've thought... They're pretty alright...
